Name: Targets
About the game: Targets is an adventure shooter that takes place in an idyllic world. Test your marksman skills as you explore the beautiful map. Are you an experienced FPS player? Take your shots from a distance and on the move. Stream your gaming skills. Are you starting First-Person shooters now? Go a bit closer to the targets and enjoy as your skills improve. Targets will let you play at your own place and style. Features static targets, moveable targets and targets that have become self-aware and will fight the player back, open world puzzles, multiple ways to solve the same situation, no death/ game over, no menus, no intro screens Unreal Engine stylized graphics 120 targets / 35 coins play with mouse+keyboard or with a controller Take a deep breath, explore the amazing map created by Polyart Studio (Unreal Marketplace) and test your marksman skills. The ideal game for PC first time first-person-shooters or for anyone who just wants to relax after work without having to wait for 10 minutes of intros and menus until the game actually starts. Controls: Keyboard + Mouse / Usb Controller Toggle Help: Keyboard 'H' Pause game: Keyboard 'P' Change mouse sensitivity: use numbers numbers 1 (lower) to 4 (higher) any time in-game Enable/Disable Vsync: Keyboard 'V' - use this if if notice excessive screen tearing during gameplay Note from author: My kids usually play with a controller while I use the mouse at the same time to help them aim. leave Game: Esc Or Alt+f4 At Any Time.
